text: Uh, here's a little bit about how "Pod Save America" came about, I'll spare you most of the details.
"Simmons's staff posted on the Internet and a few hours later 'Keeping It 1600' was born.
Our first choice for a title was "Politics as Usual," naming it after the Jay Z song, but that was taken.
Then we named it Playing Politics, which was an ironic homage to when Obama said that politics isn't a game.
After we announced that as a title, we discovered that the Minneapolis Star Tribune editorial board had a podcast by the same name, which made it impossible-" [laughter]
